channel.title: Hans on trevor elliott
channel.description: Recent content in Hans on trevor elliott

item.title: Private DHCP
item.description: Recently I was working on a project in which I was creating loads of tap devices, with HaNS instances connected to them. Initially, I was abusing the Galois network, stealing away precious addresses from our internal /24 allocation. This wasn’t the end of the world, as I was reusing addresses I was given, but it got me thinking: shouldn’t I be able to just allocate my own addresses?
